forum.service

Interface FavoriteService


  • public interface FavoriteService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      forum.entity.Favorite getFavorite(java.lang.String user, int ident)
      Returns a Favorite object for current user and comment
      java.util.List<forum.entity.Favorite> getFavorites(java.lang.String userName)
      Returns complete list of favorited comments for current forum user with comment ident, user ident and a value
      boolean isFavorite(java.lang.String user, int ident)
      Returns a boolean if a comment has been favorited by user
      void setFavorite(forum.entity.Favorite favorite)
      Adds new row(if not exists) to favorite table with corresponding parameters comment ident, user ident and favorite value +1 for thumbs up 0 for neutral -1 for thumbs down
      void updateFavorite(java.lang.String user, int ident, int value)
      After user clicking like or dislike on page for a comment, this method changes database entry with current value

    • Method Detail

      • getFavorite

        forum.entity.Favorite getFavorite(java.lang.String user,
                                  int ident)
        Returns a Favorite object for current user and comment
        Parameters:
        user - current user`s login for database selection
        ident - comment ident for database selection
        Returns:
        Favorite object when there is database entry, new neutral Favorite object when not

      • getFavorites

        java.util.List<forum.entity.Favorite> getFavorites(java.lang.String userName)
        Returns complete list of favorited comments for current forum user with comment ident, user ident and a value
        Parameters:
        userName - forum user`s login for favorites database selection
        Returns:
        List of Favorites for current user

      • isFavorite

        boolean isFavorite(java.lang.String user,
                   int ident)
        Returns a boolean if a comment has been favorited by user
        Parameters:
        user - user`s login for favorites database selection
        ident - comment ident for favorites database selection
        Returns:
        true if user has ever favorited this comment, false when not

      • setFavorite

        void setFavorite(forum.entity.Favorite favorite)
        Adds new row(if not exists) to favorite table with corresponding parameters comment ident, user ident and favorite value +1 for thumbs up 0 for neutral -1 for thumbs down
        Parameters:
        favorite - Favorite object containing all variables

      • updateFavorite

        void updateFavorite(java.lang.String user,
                    int ident,
                    int value)
        After user clicking like or dislike on page for a comment, this method changes database entry with current value
        Parameters:
        user - user login to favorite
        ident - comment ident for Favorite entry selection
        value - new Favorite value to be set
